desc: 하늘에서 떨어져 전해내려온다는 태고적 괴수의 어금니

dictionary.lore: Beautiful flying beasts used to reside in the Golzo mountains. Once, when the beasts were chasing each other among the clouds, they fumbled into the domain of one of the gods. Furious, the god took away the beasts' ability to fly, and the sky-soaring beasts started to fall from the sky. It's said that the fangs of these rare fallen beasts can be found in Lizeria.

name: 창궁의어금니
